sections.name: the name of the section
sections.prefix: a prefix to be applied to all the names of the entities

parameters.name: the name of the parameter
parameters.type: the data type of the parameter or an array of possible data types

grammar.def: something to show what metasyntax is being used

parameters.default: the default value of the parameter
parameters.parameters: an array of parameters used to represent an options object with deafults or the parameters of a callback argument

returns.type: the data type of the parameter or an array of possible data types
returns.description: a description of the return value

class.name: class name
class.extends: class name of the class this class extends
class.constructor: An function for the constructor. Prefix and type can be omitted
class.instance: An array of entities corresponding the properties of a class instance. Prefix can be omitted
class.static: An array of entities corresponding to the static methods of the class. Prefix can be omitted
